sentences.en: An awesome amount of information is stored in each video disk.
sentences.cn: 每个电视唱片可存贮数量惊人的信息.

sentences.en: Brah: Thanks a bunch . are awesome to teach me so much.
sentences.cn: 布莱: 多谢, 你真好,教我这么多.

sentences.en: Deliver your awesome power and transform my potion.
sentences.cn: 用你们神圣的力量幻化我的药剂吧.

sentences.en: Graf looked in awesome form as she cruised to an easy victory.
sentences.cn: 格拉芙轻松取胜，看上去状态极佳。

sentences.en: Having entered the international arena, an MNC faced an awesome task.
sentences.cn: 进入国际舞台后, 跨国公司面临着严峻的考验.

sentences.en: His integrity and his analytical brilliance in cutting to the core of a problem were awesome.
sentences.cn: 他为人正直,他分析问题抓住要害的才能令人肃然起敬.

sentences.en: I'm trying to ask Mitch whether he had an awesome time.
sentences.cn: 我在问米奇是不是也度过了可怕的时光.

sentences.en: It is a little awesome, isn't it?
That new white convertible is totally awesome.
sentences.cn: 那辆新的白色折篷汽车简直棒极了.

sentences.en: The aurora is one of nature's most awesome spectacles.
sentences.cn: 极光是自然界最可畏的奇观之一.

sentences.en: the awesome sweep of the scenery
The church in Ireland has always exercised an awesome power.
sentences.cn: 爱尔兰的教堂一直掌握着令人敬畏的权力。

sentences.en: The silence in the hall was awesome.
sentences.cn: 会场是一片沉寂,静得有些令人生畏.

sentences.en: The video disk stores an awesome amount of information.
sentences.cn: 电视唱片贮存着数量惊人的信息.

sentences.en: Their last concert was really awesome.
sentences.cn: 他们上一场音乐会真棒。

sentences.en: This reflected a migration of truly awesome proportions.
sentences.cn: 这是一种真正骇人的人口迁移运动.

sentences.en: When the waves of the sea are most towering its hollows are most awesome.
sentences.cn: 当海浪涌到最高的时候,浪涡是最可怕的.

words.tran_cn: 不知畏惧的；大胆的；不威严的
使…敬畏；使…惊叹（awe的过去分词）
使敬畏；使惊叹（awe的现在分词）

trans.tran_cn: 令人惊叹的，令人敬畏的，很困难的，很好的
trans.tran_en: extremely impressive, serious, or difficult so that you feel great respect, worry, or fear
